body.description: Renew skin’s surface and replenish moisture with Olay Age Defying Classic Daily Renewal Cream. It’s formulated with Vitamin E and Beta-Hydroxy Acid to renew dull surface skin. This non-greasy and oil-free facial moisturizer deeply hydrates without clogging pores, revealing a smooth complexion. Skin type - All

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #26,029 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #641 in Face Moisturizers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Olay’s Age Defying formulas with hydrating conditioners and key anti-aging ingredients like Salicylic Acid and Glycerin cleanse and exfoliate for healthy, younger-looking skin. Age Defying Classic Daily Cleanser Olay Age Defying Classic Cleanser deeply cleans and refreshes for instantly softer, smoother skin. Its skin-renewing formula has gentle exfoliators that lift away dull, dry skin while hydrating conditioners and key anti-aging ingredients like Salicylic Acid and Glycerin helps to replenish moisture. This facial cleanser also removes, makeup, dirt and oil, revealing skin that’s refreshed, renewed and beautifully clean.

Hydration, Ingredients & Regimen Hydration : Age Defying starts with hydration. As you age, it’s essential to keep skin deeply hydrated throughout the day to maintain a youthful and smooth complexion. Olay’s Age Defying Classic collection provides powerful and long-lasting hydrating benefits key in strengthening skin’s ability to retain moisture for a nourished, refreshed and energized look. Ingredients : Designed with skin-renewing ingredients and conditioners, this face wash deeply cleans, leaving your complexion feeling smooth, conditioned and refreshed. Regimen : Age Defying Classic Cleanser is the first step in your daily skincare regimen. Use Olay concentrates, treatments and moisturizers after cleansing skin. This facial cleanser is suitable for daily use and can be used in the morning, before applying makeup, and at night.

Find The Right Collection For Your Skin Regenerist formulas, with key anti-aging ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin. Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help nourish and balance for healthy-looking skin. Luminous formulas, with advanced tone-correcting ingredients like niacinamide and glycerin, are designed to visibly brighten skin and even tone. The Olay Eyes Collection is specifically formulated for the delicate eye area to fight virtually every eye concern: dark circles, puffy eyes, fine lines and under eye wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect for my aging skin. It makes me feel "cared" for when so many other products don't. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m almost 80 years old, so I’m not expecting miracles. The cream feels nice and does a good job of moisturizing my skin and the price is reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY GOOD VALUE
reviews.reviewText: I HAVE BEEN USING THIS AS A DAY & NIGHT CREAM FOR 30 PLUS YEARS & STILL LOVE IT , IT HAS BETA HYDROXY WHITCH IS A VERY GOOD ANTI AGEING AGENT FOR YOUR SKIN, IT IS A 2 OZ. JAR , THICK . A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY . I USE IT TWICE A DAY , UNDER MY MAKEUP & AT BEDTIME. A JAR LASTS FOR SEVERAL MONTHS MAKING IT A VERY GOOD VALUE WHEN COMPAIRED TO WHATS ON THE MARKET TODAY. I HAVE NEVER LET IT RUN OUT SINCE IT WAS INTRODUCED IN THE EARLEY 90s ON THE 6 PM NEWS AS THE BEST ANTI AGEING CREAM ON THE MARKET. THE THREE PACK IS A REALLY GOOD VALUE , CHEAPER THAN THE BIG W & THE BIG T. AS LEAST HERE IN HAWAII. YOU'LL LOVE IT. MARY IN HAWAII, ALOHA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Advertised as a 3 pack but only sent 1.
reviews.reviewText: This is my go to moisturizer however the subscribe and save was not executed very well. Only one unit was sent and I was charged for 3. I was not willing to continue this subscription as you are not provided a clear cut choice of underfulfillment to get the missing items. Not a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer ever. I have used for 30 years
reviews.reviewText: I like there is no heavy smell. It’s creamy and light on skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice smell & texture
reviews.reviewText: Ordered for mom when I was unable to find locally. She's 92, has used for years and isn't satisfied with anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very disappointed and wondering what was sent to me
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years , it always came with a top piece of plastic under the main jar cap.Mine was delivered with no underneath plastic and a totally different scent.Has anyone else experienced this.

Product is good but only received 1 container and was supposed to get 3. Bought on Amazon Prime Day in July 2023. I spoke with amazon customer service who put me in touch with Olay. I sent them a message and never heard back from them. Very disappointed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Overpriced! Do not rely on the photo of 3 boxes - you only get one!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, but the photo of 3 boxes of cream is deceptive. There is only one box for the price of £30+. While it’s my fault for not reading the description more closely, I feel like the seller showing a photo of 3 boxes, when you only get one, is an attempt to mislead consumers. This Olay cream should not cost more than about £10 per 2 oz box (it’s $8 is the US). I would return my overpriced purchase for a refund but it would cost £3.99 minimum to do so. I feel like I’ve been cheated, but I’ve learned the lesson to not buy in haste, based solely on a photo!
I ordered a pack of three and I only received one.
